title: Game starting, but immediately crashes
body:
So right now, I've queued up for an ARAM game. Everything is fine, I get in lobby and fix my stuff. The loading screen goes well too. But the second I've got in game, it crashes. I try to get back in, BAM. Another crash. I try to restart my client, BAM. It crashes again when I get in game. I've tried 7-8 times by now, but it's always the same result.
What is causing that?

replies.body:
It sounds like there may be either an issue accessing your display driver or something wrong with your input settings. Let's try the easiest solution which would be resetting your input file. First, log into League, then hop into your League folder (C:\Riot Games\ League of Legends). Go ahead and delete the folder called **CONFIG**, then hop into a custom match to confirm the change went through.

Let me know if this resolved your issue.
